snippet.title: BrainBread Gameplay 1: Biodome
snippet.description:
Before there was Left 4 Dead, the only games the Half-Life community had that involved shooting up loads of zombies with other players were Zombie Master and this, BrainBread, though in BrainBread, those other players will more than likely be the friendly NPCs, because barely anyone plays this mod anymore. 

IMO, the RPG elements in this are an interesting touch to the zombie shooter genre, being able to increase your health, speed and skills. Also, once your health reaches 0, you become a zombie! You also get cool weapons such as the chaingun (not in this video) and flamethrower

Some things that I sort of gripe about in this mod is that almost all the missions have the same objective (get the suitcase, kill Fred, kill x amount of zombies, escape) and that the zombie gameplay (not in this video) is sort of unnecessary (once you kill an certain amount of nonzombies such as the friendly npcs, you respawn as a human again; there's no consequences for becoming a zombie and you can't infect other players). Also, your axe is a crappy melee weapon.

But at least all the maps are very well designed (with maps having cyberpunk to modern day urban environments to swamp themes), not to mention the huge variety of weapons, so the game does not feel that repetitive. 

The map in this video is bb_scifi_chp3_biodome

There was also going to be a Source version of this mod, but there hasn't been any news on that mod since 2007.

Download mod here:
http://www.ironoak.ch/BB/

No, I did not play BrainBread all the way up to level 109. I sorta... spammed "impulse 101" into the console.
